Note: For a closely related version see 3769.
_description: An Epiphany carol — twelve 5-line stanzas (aaabb, lacks burden)

BLHar541.First Lines:
Now ys crystemas ycumFadyr and son togedyr in
                    oon…
BLHar541.Last Lines:
…To the kynge of grete renownOf grace-aIn hevyn to have a
                    place-a
